TopicTitle: KSP@Tempoverse, a wiki-like page I'm making for my KSP roleplay

Articles.Content:
I've been thinking about how to put in writing the RP I do in my mind while playing the career mode. I'm not good at storytelling, so I opted for a wiki format and threw together a website. Here it is:

http://kerbals.buildsomethingamazing.com/

Two projects my Kerbals are building that I'm particularly proud of:

  • Space Station One (some nice vistas there)
  • Worker Bees Program (screenshots in the sublinks to crafts) (yes, the idea is stolen straight from Star Trek and the little worker ships you can spot in the shipyards)

I'm a relatively new player and I have still a lot in front of me, so I'm hoping this thing will grow and become more interesting.

Anyway, back to building that damn McKerbley station. Cheers!

//EDIT

And pretty much minutes after I pressed Submit, a Space Kraken attacked, tearing the space station to pieces! Must have seen this thread.

Edited December 13, 2014 by TeMPOraL
